amendment.description: To establish the National Foreign Language Coordination Council to develop and implement a foreign language strategy.

action.text: Amendment SA 2485, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2485 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2485 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S12589-12595) To establish the National Foreign Language Coordination Council to develop and implement a foreign language strategy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2485 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2485 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Akaka.
